content.raw: I think Integral and command limits has done the same role that the <effort> of SDF file has. I tuned the controller based on effort value, in my test when I assigned the limits of PIDs, the controller could not works well, even with the using the same <effort> and SDF file. Did you test the merged version that the robot could walk and spawn using the sample agent?
